alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lolo National Forest, Welcome Creek And Scapegoat Wildernesses (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 02 at 1:14PM MDT until September 04 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT SATURDAY NIGHT... The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Affected area: Fire Zone 108 (East Lolo). * Impacts: The combination of gusty winds, low humidity, and an unstable atmosphere will result in critical fire weather conditions Saturday afternoon and evening. Isolated thunderstorms are possible Saturday afternoon and evening, which could contribute to new fire starts. Thunderstorms will be capable of gusty and erratic outflows. * Winds: Southwest to west winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph. * Minimum humidities: 9 to 15 percent. * Haines: 6 High. &&

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lolo National Forest, Welcome Creek And Scapegoat Wildernesses
